technology.short_description: Every staff blessed by the God of Magic's sorcery doubles as a blunt instrument of brutality.

effects.description: Melee defence: +1 per experience rank for all Spear and Halberd infantry units
Attribute: Expert Charge Defence for all Spear and Halberd infantry units (Rank 4 and above)

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

technology.short_description: An ancient books of spells contains dark, hidden wisdom; enough to drive its reader to madness.

effects.description: Enables Warpflame attacks for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Tzeentch
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Tzeentch and Metal spells

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

technology.short_description: Attuning with the energies of Chaos opens many doors in the mind.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Army ability: "Storm of Fire"

technology.short_description: The Whirling Destroyers of Tzeentch answer only to their God's most valued servants.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flamers units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +3 for Pink Horrors units

technology.short_description: Bolstered by ritual and prayer, the mortal warriors of Tzeentch fight with renewed vigour.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Tzeentch

Physical resistance: 3% for all units for each active Gift of Tzeentch
	(all armies)

technology.short_description: Daemonic steeds are driven by unnatural hunger, carrying mortals sworn to Chaos into battle in search of prey.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Gorebeast Chariots, Doom Knights and Skullcrushers
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Knights

technology.short_description: Foul magic is weaved into leather and chain, strengthening its mortal wearer.

effects.description: Ability: "Hidden in Time" for Aspiring Champions units

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

effects.description: Barrier hit points: +25% for all units with the Mark of Tzeentch
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units

technology.short_description: The dark rites must be performed, if the chosen are to rise among the ranks of Ruin.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chosen
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Warriors

technology.short_description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Knights
Enables magical attacks for Chaos Knights units

technology.short_description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -20% for all units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, Chaos Knights and Aspiring Champion units

technology.short_description: All the forces of Chaos must unite, if the scourge of Order is to ever be undone.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Skaven, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Skaven, Norsca and Beastmen for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.short_description: A worthy Beastmaster needs no chains to direct the ferocious nature of his darling pets.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: Once one bears the Mark of Tzeentch, their fate is forever changed.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Tzeentch
Unlocks Warband upgrades: Exalted Pink Horrors
Barrier hit points: +750 for Aspiring Champions

technology.short_description: All sacrifices are made under the banner of Tzeentch, filling the hearts of His warriors with pride.

effects.description: Tzeentch Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: Let the Marauders gather under their Dark Masters' eternal gaze.

effects.description: Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauders

technology.short_description: Engineers have perfected a wicked machine of war, drawn by fearsome steeds into the very heart of battle.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Chariots and Hellstriders
Unit experience gain: +25% for Marauder Horsemen

technology.short_description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Chaotic Torment" when attacking
Attribute: Cause Fear for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Control: +1
All Authority: +1

technology.short_description: Such massive iron bands are a marvel to behold, lending strength to the swing of the most colossal creatures.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Giant and Cockatrice units
Missile resistance: 25% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Giant and Cockatrice units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Ruinous Powers will be looking.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Forsaken Blessing" when attacking
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description: Control: +1
All Authority: +1

technology.short_description: When Morrslieb bathes the land in its sickly glow, the Curseling's capacity for power greatly expands.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Changing of the Ways: "Break Alliance"
Ability: "Gate of Tzeentch" for Aspiring Champions units

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Pink Horrors

technology.short_description: Tzeentch directs His Daemons to His champion, to aid the cause of worldly domination.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Lord of Change units
Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to upgrade characters to a Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Tzeentch spells

technology.short_description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.short_description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment and post-battle loot bonus effects for Altar Improvement buildings
Construction time: -20% for all buildings

technology.short_description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings. Think of all the needle-teeth and tentacles it bestows.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Forsaken
Attribute: Cause Terror for Chaos Spawn units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units

technology.short_description: Unholy tributes and towering monuments ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +3
Chaos corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.short_description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

effects.description: Souls gained from battles: +20%

technology.short_description: Enchanted idols sit atop the altar of sacrifice, exuding waves of pure corruption.

effects.description: Tzeentch corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Tzeentch corruption: +1 for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: Perhaps the threat of a collar and chain would remind these lesser beings of their place.

effects.description: Request army cost: -25%
War co-ordination target cost: -25%

technology.short_description: Where Thomin's long stride is not fast enough, teleportation will surely suffice.

effects.description: Teleport stance usage cost: -50% Winds of Magic

technology.short_description: The vile sorcery of Vilitch is weaved into the foundations of every building.

effects.description: Unlocks bonus research rate effect for Dark Fortress military buildings

technology.short_description: A free mind is one unshackled by the burdens of ignorance, and open to receiving Tzeentch's twisted blessings.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Army ability: "Bolt of Change"

technology.short_description: The most powerful seers of Tzeentch divine the location of every sacrifice made in His honour.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Tzeentch
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Tzeentchian factions for each active Gift of Tzeentch

technology.short_description: Those bearing the Mark of Tzeentch gather in strength, answering the summons of the Master of Misrule.

effects.description: Path to Glory: +50% levels kept when devoting a character to Tzeentch
Hero capacity: +2 for Exalted Heroes
Hero capacity: +2 for Chaos Sorcerers
Enables direct recruitment of Marked Chaos Sorcerers
Enables direct recruitment of Marked Exalted Heroes
